description: This sweet dessert is full of aromatic spices.
name: Spiced Stewed Nectarines Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large sauce pan on a medium heat add the water, star anise, allspice, star anise, cinnamon, sugar and nectarines.
Cook until the sugar has melted, then lower the heat and allow to simmer for 15 minutes until the sauce starts to reduce, stirring occasionally.
After 15 minutes you can remove the nectarines from the pan and place into your serving dish.
Allow the sauce in the pan to keep cooking to reduce further.
While the sauce is reducing, whip the cream with the icing and nutmeg until fluffy.
Add the cream to the top of the stew nectarines and then drizzle some of the reduced sauce over the top before serving removing the star anise and cinnamon.
